      • updateAircraft

        public void updateAircraft(java.lang.String serialNumber,
                           java.lang.String model,
                           java.lang.String newSerialNumber,
                           java.lang.String maintenanceStatus,
                           java.lang.String missionHistory,
                           java.lang.String pilotAssignment,
                           java.util.Date lastInspectionDate,
                           java.lang.String discrepancies)
        Updates an existing aircraft in the database.
        Parameters:
        serialNumber - The serial number of the aircraft to update.
        model - The new model of the aircraft.
        newSerialNumber - The new serial number of the aircraft.
        maintenanceStatus - The new maintenance status of the aircraft.
        missionHistory - The new mission history of the aircraft.
        pilotAssignment - The new pilot assignment for the aircraft.
        lastInspectionDate - The new last inspection date of the aircraft.
        discrepancies - The new discrepancies found in the aircraft.
